article.title: June 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The June 2013 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • Register for GCC2013 by 7 June 14 June to avoid late registration rates
  • Two new public servers ODoSE and CBiB
  • 39 new papers
  • Open Positions at four different institutions
  • Other Upcoming Events
  • Duplicate Accounts on Main
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the July Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
